movie.title: Lord or the Strings
movie.synopsis: An evil wizard controls “Magic Strings” in a fantasy tale that will string you along to the last letter. Invalid data types beware as “You shall not parse”.

movie.title: The Ternarator
movie.synopsis: No if, else about it, a young programming terminates decisions in a single line.

movie.title: Double jeopardy
movie.synopsis: Framed for using the wrong data type, a young programming was sentenced for a long time. Trying to keep a float in troubled waters he sets out to find the real offender.

movie.title: Byte club
movie.synopsis: Discontent with modern day languages, a young programmer starts an underground club for writing software purely in byte code.

movie.title: Char wars
movie.synopsis: With a star studded cast of characters from a to z. This outer world sci-fi adventure finds a programing discovering her ability to use the source.
